Title: Relates to enacting the "small business fairness act"
Summary: Enacts the "small business fairness act" to permit a business that has been ordered to cease or limit operations pursuant to an executive order due to a declared state disaster emergency to continue or resume operations if the products sold or services offered by the business are also available at a business that has not been required to cease or limit operations by the executive order or an order of the health department.
LawCode: Amd ยง29-a, Exec L; add ยง12-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the small business fairness act
